title: Rattling The Truth + Classic Interviews
itunes:title: Rattling The Truth + Classic Interviews
description:
Wednesday 12/28 - Today we continue with the best interviews from 2016 where most of the interviews had to do with Charlamagne trying to rattle the truth out of the guest, such as finding out Pharrell's skin care secrets to if Plies and Angela Yee are really dating. We also revisited the time when Deray Davis came on the show and when Trevor Noah visited, both with controversial topics. Charlamagne awarded Bow Wow for Donkey of the Day and Marie Holmes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
